channel.title: Jericho Chat Updates
channel.description: Site and software updates for Jericho Chat

item.title: Version 1.41 released
item.description: Jericho Chat version 1.41 released with a small bug fix to the user interface.

item.title: Version 1.4 released
item.description: Jericho Chat version 1.4 released with modifed TRNG algorithm after a review, also the ability to use your own custom random data with the program.

item.title: Version 1.3 released
item.description: Jericho Chat version 1.3 released with group chat between 2-7 users, a new secure server protocol and new true random number generator.

item.title: Version 1.2 released
item.description: Version 1.2 released with improved entropy collector and randomness extraction process.

item.title: Version 1.1 released
item.description: Version 1.1 released with a few minor improvements also new server and client installation guides.

item.title: Jericho Chat Launched
item.description: Jericho Encrypted Chat v1.0 with unbreakable one-time pad encryption is now freely available for everyone.
